meta.article_title: June 1, 2015 - Fast No-Spin Serves to the Middle

fast_no_spin_serve_to_middle.probleme: Fast no-spin serve to the middle
causes_communes: Receiver has to make a snap decision on forehand or backhand
Receiver is rushed and has little time to make decisions and movements
Receiver tends to shorten his stroke and lose control

debutant.nom: Fast no-spin serve to the middle
debutant.description: Contact the ball perhaps a foot behind the end-line, as low to the table as possible, with some topspin.

exercices_complementaires.nom: Fast no-spin serve to the middle
exercices_complementaires.description: Practice serving fast and knocking off targets on the far end of the table.
